channel.title: Cointelegraph.com News
channel.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest news and analyses on the future of money.

image.title: Cointelegraph.com News
image.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest news and analyses on the future of money.

item.title: SEC approves 9 more WisdomTree 'blockchain-enabled' funds
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brian Quarmby
item.description: After announcing the approval of nine new digital funds, WisdomTree reiterated that it wants to further integrate blockchain tech to improve the investor experience.

item.title: Creditor offers Bitcoin miner Core Scientific $72M to avoid bankruptcy
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Luke Huigsloot
item.description: B. Riley suggested the embattled miner’s issues were “self-imposed” and outlined a path for it to avoid bankruptcy.

item.title: Alameda tried to redeem 3,000 wBTC days before bankruptcy: BitGo CEO
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brayden Lindrea
item.description: The CEO of Bitgo stated that the Alameda representative failed the security verification process required to convert wrapped-BTC into BTC.

item.title: FTX Bahamas co-CEO Ryan Salame blew the whistle on FTX and Sam Bankman-Fried
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Jesse Coghlan
item.description: Court filings show Ryan Salame tipped off the Bahaman securities regulator, telling them that FTX was sending customer funds to Alameda Research.

item.title: Realized losses from FTX collapse peaked at $9B, far below earlier crises
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Luke Huigsloot
item.description: Weekly-realized losses peaked at $20.5 billion when Terra Luna (LUNC) imploded and reached $33 billion when 3AC and Celsius collapsed, according to Chainalysis.

item.title: Rep. Tom Emmer mulls bringing back bill aimed at reducing crypto red tape
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brian Quarmby
item.description: Tom Emmer is considering reintroducing a bill that removes the requirement for entities to be registered as money transmitters if they don’t handle customer assets.

item.title: FTX ex-staffer: Extravagant expenditures and cult-like worshipping of SBF
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Jesse Coghlan
item.description: A former FTX employee has revealed details regarding the lavish expenditures of the exchange as well as its intense company culture.

item.title: Only 1% of people can handle crypto self-custody right now: Binance CEO
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brayden Lindrea
item.description: Changpeng Zhao’s comments come as billions of dollars of stablecoins continue to flow out of the Binance exchange.

item.title: Maple Finance 2.0 overhaul aims to speed the process for loan defaults
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Blackstone
item.description: The overhaul of the protocol, dubbed "Maple 2.0," comes only weeks after the decentralized lending platform saw two major defaults on the back of FTX's collapse.

item.title: Bitcoin retraces intraday gains as bears aim to pin BTC price under $18K
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Marcel Pechman
item.description: BTC bears are positioned to profit from this week’s Bitcoin options expiry, especially if price stays below $18,000.

item.title: SBF’s Bahamian prison reported for 'harsh' conditions and 'degrading treatment' — US State Dept
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: Bahamian Commissioner of Correctional Services Doan Cleare reportedly said that most of the facilities had been renovated since 2021 and now had no “issues with rodents."

item.title: New OECD report takes lessons from crypto winter, faults ‘financial engineering’
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: The Organisation for Economic Cooperation and Development found regulation and retail consumer protections lacking in a highly complex trading environment.

item.title: Binance 'put FTX out of business' — Kevin O'Leary
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: A US Senate committee heard details of the investor's conversations with Sam Bankman-Fried before the collapse.

item.title: Here is why Bitcoin price gave back all its intraday gains
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Kyle White
item.description: BTC price retraced all of its intraday gains after Fed chair Jerome Powell issued hawkish statements related to the central bank's 50 basis point interest rate hike.

item.title: MetaMask to allow users to purchase and transfer Ethereum via PayPal
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Judith BannermanQuist
item.description: The service will initially be rolled out to select PayPal users within the United States.

item.title: Senate FTX hearing: calls for regulation and crypto criticisms aplenty
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: "Short of enacting draconian authoritarian policies, cryptocurrency cannot be stopped," said Senator Pat T

item.title: The Agenda podcast chats crypto and sex work with WetSpace CEO Allie Rae
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Jonathan DeYoung
item.description: Allie Rae of WetSpace joins Cointelegraph’s new podcast The Agenda to discuss how crypto and blockchain can empower adult content creators.

item.title: NFTs minted on FTX break: Nifty Newsletter, Dec. 7–13
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ezra Reguerra
item.description: Because of the “ridiculous amount” of NFTs being minted, entrepreneur Gary Vaynerchuck argued that it’s unlikely for another market boom to happen.

item.title: Anonymous crypto developers belong in prison — and will be there soon
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Shinnosuke 'Shin' Murata
item.description: Users are interested in knowing the identities of developers behind the games they play. And soon, lawmakers are likely to write such disclosures into law.

item.title: Crypto users claim Gemini email leak occurred much earlier than first reported
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Zhiyuan Sun
item.description: Alleged reports of compromised emails began appearing as early as October.

item.title: Sens. Warren and Marshall introduce new money-laundering legislation for crypto
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: The senators have created a harsh, sweeping bill to clean up crypto’s AML/KYC act that will benefit from further discussion in the next Congress.

item.title: Why is the crypto market up today?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Kyle White
item.description: The crypto market is up today, reflecting market participants’ expectation that the next rate hike will not exceed 0.50% and that Fed chair Powell will issue positive statements.

item.title: Reaching the Bitcoin price bottom is a process, says The Wolf of All Streets, Scott Melker
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Benjamin Pirus
item.description: “People love to point at a specific price in hindsight as the bottom of an asset, but bottoming is a process,” Melker says during the first episode of Crypto Trading Secrets.

item.title: Bitcoin traders await FOMC, Powell as BTC price hits new 1-month high
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: Bitcoin keeps up the gains in U.S. stocks with hours to go until a decision on rate hikes and comments from Fed Chair Powell.

item.title: Comic-Con guru says storytelling is the key component for successful NFT projects
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Alyssa Exposito
item.description: Kumite NFT founder Gareb Shamus chats with NFT Steez about how NFT projects can engage with their respective communities through storytelling.

item.title: 'Third-party incident' impacted Gemini with 5.7 million emails leaked
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Zhiyuan Sun
item.description: Users’ emails and partial phone numbers were leaked in what Gemini claimed to be a "third-party" incident.

item.title: Will FTX’s ill wind reach the Global South? Maybe not
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Andrew Singer
item.description: In Latin America, "crypto is functional, it has a real utility." It can hedge inflation, provide access to dollars and internationalize wealth.

item.title: Fonbnk’s Michael Kimani sorts out facts on crypto adoption in Africa
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Elisha Owusu Akyaw
item.description: The first episode of Hashing It Out features Cointelegraph’s Elisha Owusu Akyaw (GhCryptoGuy) and Michael Kimani, Fonbnk’s co-founder and head of growth in Africa.

item.title: As DEXs struggle, new approaches kindle hope
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Bryan Conover
item.description: Despite their popularity, DEXs have a number of drawbacks that may be preventing growth. A new approach, however, has offered a way forward.

item.title: Nasdaq warns Bitcoin mining firm Bitfarms about share price deficiency
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Helen Partz
item.description: Bitfarms has an initial period of 180 calendar days to have its shares trading above $1 for at least 10 days before June 12, 2023.
